m_szDocSumamry: High Performance Lead Acid Battery with Advanced Electrolyte System US 20140023917 A1 Abstract Herein provided is an electrochemical cell electrolyte formed from ingredients comprising: water, sulfuric acid, and at least one octylphenol ethoxylate of Formula 1: where n is a natural number from at least 1 to at most 16. Images(6) Claims(28) What is claimed is: 1. An electrochemical cell electrolyte formed from ingredients comprising: water, sulfuric acid, and at least one octylphenol ethoxylate of Formula 1: where n is a natural number from at least 1 to at most 16. 2.
